body_html:
thanks for the tip, i just found out that the error occured when I built the user_op without GPU support.

I reinstalled tensorflow v 0.10, with GPU support, and placed all user_op files inside //tensorflow/core/user_ops.

If I compile the user_op using bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/core/user_ops:roi_pooling.so (the addition of --config=cuda isn't in the tensorflow user_op documentation), the user_op now works.. I guess this issue could now be closed

body:
thanks for the tip, i just found out that the error occured when I built the user_op without GPU support. 

I reinstalled tensorflow v 0.10, with GPU support, and placed all user_op files inside //tensorflow/core/user_ops. 

If I compile the user_op using bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/core/user_ops:roi_pooling.so (the addition of --config=cuda isn't in the tensorflow user_op documentation), the user_op now works.. I guess this issue could now be closed
